title: "5.19 The ‘sand-pile’ forest fire model"
format: html
---

[![](5.19-dsFFM.png)](5.19-dsFFM.nlogo){style="float:left; margin-right:10px; margin-bottom:5px;"} This model is an implementation of a simple forest fire model with a primary focus on the size distribution of the fires that are produced. It is based on the model described in

Bak P and Chen K 1990 A forest-fire model and some thoughts on turbulence. _Physics Letters A_ **147** 297–300.
